children.text: Recharge Your Body, Refresh Your Skin with IV Drips in Pune
Advanced, dermatologist-supervised IV Therapy in Pune for glowing skin, stronger immunity, and instant energy boost. Hydration • Wellness • Glow • Recovery
What Is IV Therapy (IV Drips)?

IV Therapy, also known as IV Drips, is an advanced wellness treatment that delivers essential vitamins, minerals, antioxidants, and hydration directly into your bloodstream. Unlike oral supplements that take time to absorb, IV therapy ensures 100% nutrient absorption—helping your body recover, rejuvenate, and perform at its best. At The Skin Firm, NIBM, Pune, our IV Drips are designed to boost skin health, immunity, energy, and overall vitality, leaving you feeling refreshed and glowing from the inside out.
Signs You May Benefit from IV Therapy
Low energy, constant fatigue, or burnout
Dull, dehydrated, or tired-looking skin
Weak immunity and frequent illness
Slow recovery after workouts or stress
Poor sleep, jet lag, or hangovers
Nutrient deficiencies despite supplements
Stressed lifestyle with poor hydration
Why Choose IV Therapy at The Skin Firm?
Feeling run-down, low on energy, or noticing your skin has lost its glow? We know how draining modern life can be.

At The Skin Firm, NIBM our customised IV drips - like the Skin Glow Drip in Pune, Immunity Boost IV, and Hydration Drip - are carefully curated by Dr. Karishma Singh to restore balance, energy, and radiance. Unlike generic salon drips, our treatments are medical grade, dermatologist-supervised, and tailored to your needs - whether that's glowing skin, strong immunity, or full-body rejuvenation.
How Our IV Therapy Works
A personalised assessment to understand your health, lifestyle, and nutrient needs.
Based on your goals, we recommend drips for skin brightening, hydration, immunity, detox, or energy.
The drip is administered in a comfortable, relaxing environment. It takes 30–60 minutes, during which vitamins and antioxidants flow directly into your bloodstream.
We provide hydration and lifestyle tips to complement your IV therapy for long-lasting benefits.

brightens and hydrates skin with antioxidants

Post-Care After IV Therapy
Stay hydrated with water post-session
Avoid alcohol and smoking for 24 hours
Maintain a balanced diet to prolong benefits
Follow your personalised IV schedule for continued wellness

FAQs on IV Therapy (IV Drips) in Pune

items.question: How long does an IV drip take?

children.text: Most sessions last 30-60 minutes.
Yes - when done under medical supervision. At The Skin Firm, all drips are dermatologist designed and safe.

items.question: How soon will I see results?

children.text: Many clients feel energised and refreshed immediately. Skin benefits are seen within days.

items.question: How many IV therapy sessions will I need?

children.text: It depends on your goals. Some people do single drips for an event, while others choose regular sessions for long-term wellness.
Only a tiny pinprick is felt when the IV is inserted. The drip itself is painless.

items.question: Are there any side effects of IV therapy?

children.text: Minor bruising or soreness at the site is possible but rare.

items.question: Can IV therapy replace a healthy diet?

children.text: No - it complements a healthy lifestyle but does not replace good nutrition.
Pregnant women, people with certain medical conditions, or those advised against by their doctor. A consultation ensures safety.

items.question: Is IV therapy suitable for men too?

children.text: Yes, IV therapy is equally effective for both men and women.

items.question: Can I combine IV drips with other skin treatments?

children.text: Yes - IV therapy pairs well with facials, peels, and laser treatments for enhanced results.
